data.name: 0000 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Now starting the Puzzle Phase tutorial.

data.name: 0001 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In the Puzzle Phase, you will navigate abnormal space with an SOS Brigade member.

data.name: 0002 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The objective is to cause the abnormal space naturally dissolve...

data.name: 0003 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...before Haruhi Suzumiya arrives.

data.name: 0004 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In order to do that, you must find the hidden "singularities" on the map...

data.name: 0005 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...and then materialize and erase them.

data.name: 0006 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04On the bottom left of the screen, "Left" counts the total number of singularities.

data.name: 0007 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Next to it is the "Goal" number, which counts...

data.name: 0008 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...the minimum number of singularities you must erase to clear the stage.

data.name: 0009 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In order to clear the Puzzle Phase, you must…

data.name: 0010 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…either erase all of the singularities, or achieve the goal before "Time Over" occurs.

data.name: 0011 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04If you are unable to find and erase the goal number of singularities…

data.name: 0012 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…before the time limit shown on the top screen runs out…

data.name: 0013 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…it will result in Game Over.

data.name: 0014 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04In abnormal space, you are able to do the following actions with your Brigade member.

data.name: 0015 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04１. "Movement"

data.name: 0016 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Touch a location and they will move there.

data.name: 0017 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04２. "Area Search"

data.name: 0018 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When the search icon on the upper left of the screen is off, tap at your member's feet.

data.name: 0019 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Doing so will select the center tile and the 8 surrounding tiles (nine tiles total)…

data.name: 0020 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …and perform an area search.

data.name: 0021 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Depending on the area search, you maybe able to find hidden singularities.

data.name: 0022 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: However, you will not be able to materialize singularities with an area search.

data.name: 0023 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Once you've inferred the position of a hidden singularity by the markers near your feet…

data.name: 0024 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …please materialize the singularity by using the "Point Search" action.

data.name: 0025 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04３. "Point Search"

data.name: 0026 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you touch the "Search Icon" at the upper left of the screen...

data.name: 0027 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...an icon indicating point search mode will appear over the member's head.

data.name: 0028 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you touch a specific tile while in this mode, the brigade member will move...

data.name: 0029 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...to the adjacent tile, and perform a point search.

data.name: 0030 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you search a point that contains a hidden singularity...

data.name: 0031 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...this will force it to materialize.

data.name: 0032 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You can only use point search to search one tile at a time…

data.name: 0033 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …but this serves as the basic action to materialize a singularity.

data.name: 0034 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you want to perform the area search action again, turn off the search icon.

data.name: 0035 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Please be careful to not confuse these two modes.

data.name: 0036 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you search, the marks near your feet indicate the odds of a singularity existing.

data.name: 0037 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The "!" mark on a tile indicates that a singularity exists on one of…

data.name: 0038 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...the surrounding nine tiles that includes the tile itself.

data.name: 0039 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The number of "!" marks will increase according to how many singularities…

data.name: 0040 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …exist in the tiles surrounding it.

data.name: 0041 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Once a singularity has materialized, rub it with your stylus to erase it.

data.name: 0042 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you rub an area slightly wider than it appears, you can erase it more efficiently.

data.name: 0043 (582.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: As a final reminder, please be mindful of the time limit when finding and erasing singularities.
